title: What TV show used the song 'Who Are You' by The Who as its theme song? - Quora

response.answer_text: What TV show used the song "Who Are You" by The Who as its theme song? The one that comes immediately to mind is the original CSI: Crime Scene Investigation (Las Vegas) - I happen to be FROM Las Vegas, so this show has a certain local affinity for me. Interestingly enough, the Who’s music was such a hit for this show, that when they were making the spin-offs, they continued the trend of using The Who’s most popular songs, each recut for intro purposes. “CSI: Crime Scene Investigation” WHO ARE YOU – THE WHO  “CSI: Miami” WON'T GET FOOLED AGAIN – THE WHO “CSI: New York” BABA O'REILLY – THE WHO “CSI: Cyber” I CAN SEE FOR MILES – THE WHO
Who Are You was the theme song for the original CSI series. Each CSI show used a song by The Who as the theme song— Won't Get Fooled Again for CSI Miami and Baba O’Reilly for CSI: NY
